description:
Modern, warm decor inside.  Super clean and well maintained.  A 5 minute walk from both Gramercy Park and Madison Square Park. Tons of transit in the area to easily get you around the city. 55" Samsung Smart LED TV with Apple TV. Fully equipped kitchen with Washer & Dryer, Dishwasher, Oven, Microwave, and everything else you'll need in the unit. Great water pressure in the shower!  Much more affordable than spending $500/night in a hotel during holiday season!

Charming, quiet neighborhood with tons of great restaurants and bars!

6 train a few short blocks away

Private balcony for your use.
name: Clean, Cozy, Modern Gramercy Apt
review: Just as described. Very clean and well appointed. Perfect location. Communication was easy and swift. Highly recommended
